short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to customize the WhatsApp Web for privacy and productivity, hide the chat list, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhatsApp Web Sidebar Toolkit is designed to help you control whatâ€™s visible during screen sharing or when taking screenshots on WhatsApp Web. With just a click, you can toggle the sidebar containing your chat list to give you more space to focus on the selected chat. Additionally, activate a blur effect to obscure the sidebar conversations for enhanced privacy, ensuring sensitive information stays hidden during screen captures or meetings

Key Features:

Toggle the visibility of the sidebar to increase screen space.
Blur the chat sidebar for privacy during screenshots or screen sharing.
Simple, lightweight extension tailored for privacy-conscious users.
Fully compatible with WhatsApp Web
